conversations.content: How much did I spend on shopping today?

<|Function_Thought|>
The current date is May 19, 2024. To determine how much was spent on shopping today, I need to view the order history and check for any orders made on today's date.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[view_order_history()]<|/Function_Call|>

{'Order 1': {'order_id': 'ORDER-104674', 'product_name': 'Adidas Mens Z.n.e. T-Shirt', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-04-18', 'delivery_date': '2024-04-20', 'product_id': 'P030'}, 'Order 2': {'order_id': 'ORDER-107495', 'product_name': 'TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-06', 'delivery_date': '2024-05-10', 'product_id': 'P045'}, 'Order 3': {'order_id': 'ORDER-112543', 'product_name': 'Portable SSD 1TB', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-19', 'delivery_date': '2024-05-19', 'product_id': 'P009'}, 'Order 4': {'order_id': 'ORDER-113219', 'product_name': 'SpeedStep Running Shoes', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-19', 'delivery_date': None, 'product_id': 'P023'}}

<|Function_Thought|>
The order history indicates two orders were placed on May 19, 2024:
1. Portable SSD 1TB
2. SpeedStep Running Shoes  

To find out how much was spent, I need to fetch and check the invoice details for both orders.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[get_invoice(order_id="ORDER-112543")]<|/Function_Call|>
The invoice has been sent to your email inbox.

<|Function_Thought|>
The invoice for "ORDER-112543" (Portable SSD 1TB) was sent to the email and not returned here. I will proceed to get the invoice for the second order placed today, "ORDER-113219" (SpeedStep Running Shoes).
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[get_invoice(order_id="ORDER-113219")]<|/Function_Call|>
The invoice has been sent to your email inbox.

<|Final_Answer|>The invoices for both orders placed today (Portable SSD 1TB and SpeedStep Running Shoes) have been sent to your email inbox. Please check your email for the total amount spent on these purchases. If you need further assistance, feel free to let me know!<|/Final_Answer|>
